japanese: それじゃ、まずカメラマンは私がやるね。
translation: Then, I'll be the photographer, first.

japanese:
あ、カメラはどうするんだ？
撮影用の立派なものなんてないが……。
translation:
Ah, so what are we going to do about the camera?
We don't really have anything stellar
to take pictures with...

japanese:
スマホで充分だよ。
今のは性能もいいし、別に気取った写真集を
作るわけじゃないんだからさ。
translation:
A smartphone is good enough.
They take good photos now, and we're not making
a particularly fancy photo book.

japanese:
よーし、まずは集合写真だ！
みんな撮るよ～？
translation:
Alright, let's take a group picture!
Here we go, everyone?

japanese:
ちょ、ちょっと待って！
みんな整列！　整列してくださーい！
translation:
H-hold on!
Everyone, form a line! Please, form a line!

japanese: フー君は私の隣ね。
translation: Fu-kun will be next to me.

japanese: らいはちゃんは、お兄さんの隣がいいですよね！
translation:
Raiha-chan,
you'd like to be next to your big brother, huh?

japanese:
うん！
じゃあ、反対側は五月さんね。
translation:
Yes!
Okay, so you be on the other side of me, Itsuki-san.

japanese:
えっ？
あ、はい、わかりました。
translation:
Huh?
Ah, okay, I understand.

japanese: ……ぬぬ。
translation: ...Mmmm.

japanese:
んー？　ちょっとフレームに入りきらないなぁ。
らいはちゃんはフータロー君の前でどう？
translation:
Hmmm? Hold on, not all of you can fit in the frame.
Raiha-chan, how about getting in front of Futaro-kun?

japanese: わかった！
translation: I got it!

japanese:
で、フータロー君は
もうちょっと五月ちゃんに近づいてみて。
translation:
Now, Futaro-kun,
get a little closer to Itsuki.

japanese: こんなもんか？
translation: Like this?

japanese: あ、あの、これはちょっと近すぎじゃ……。
translation: U-um, you're a little too close...

japanese: じゃあ撮るよ、はいチーズ！
translation: Alright, I'll take the picture! Say cheese!

japanese: よしよし、どうかな？
translation: Great, how did it turn out?

japanese:
ぷっ、あははは！
みんな緊張して表情がガッチガチだ！
あーあ、これはもう、あははは！
translation:
Pfft, ahahaha!
Everyone's so nervous, your expressions are so stiff!
Aaaah, this is too much, ahahahah!

japanese:
そんなに？
ちょっと見せて。
translation:
Is it that bad?
Let me see.

japanese: ……これはひどいな。
translation: ...This is horrid.

japanese: 特に五月がひどい。
translation: Itsuki, you're especially horrid.

japanese: 私……こんな顔ができたのですね……。
translation:
It...was possible for me
to make this face, huh...

japanese: 消してもいいかしら？　いいわよね？
translation:
I can delete it, right?
That's okay, isn't it?

japanese:
これはこれでいいんじゃない？
ただの集合写真よりも想い出になるって、絶対。
translation:
Isn't this fine on its own?
I bet it will become a better memory
than just a normal group photo would.

japanese:
あんたは写ってないからそんなことが言えるのよ！
ほら、次は一花も入りなさい！
translation:
You can say that because you're not part of the picture!
Come on, you get in the picture next!

japanese:
いいのいいの、今は私がカメラマンなんだから。
それに三脚もないしさ。
translation:
Nah, it's fine, I'll be the photographer.
We also don't have a tripod.

japanese:
次は何を撮ろっか。
想い出だから、島のあっちこっちを
撮っておきたいかも。
translation:
What should we take next?
Since it's for memories, I'd like to take photos
all over the island.

japanese:
いいですね。
まずは別荘をバックに１枚、どうでしょう？
translation:
Good idea.
How about a picture
with the villa in the background first?

japanese:
そうね。
あとは……どこか景色がいいところって
あったかしら？
translation:
You're right.
Then...are there any good places with good scenery?

japanese:
あ！　映えだね、二乃がよく言ってる映え！
映えスポットを探さなきゃ！
translation:
Ah! We gotta find a place to pose,
that Nino often talks about!
We have to find a spot that we can post about!

japanese: バエ？
translation: Pose?

japanese: おっと、その表情いただき！
translation: Oh? I'll snap that expression.

japanese:
あっ！？
そんな、いきなりですか？
translation:
Oh?!
Just like that?

japanese:
いい顔だったよ？
キョトンって音がしそうな可愛い感じ。
translation:
It was a good expression, you know?
It was cute, like you were in a daze.

japanese: か、可愛いだなんて……。
translation: C-cute, you say...

japanese: これは危険……。
translation: This is getting dangerous...

japanese: 隙を見せたら……撮られるわ！
translation: If we give her an opening...she'll take a shot!

japanese: つまり一花と私たちの勝負！？
translation: So, it's a game between Ichika and us?

japanese:
もー、勝負ってなに？
みんな撮られること意識しすぎだよ。
translation:
Oh c'mon, what's a game?
You guys are worried too much
about having your picture taken.

japanese:
フータロー君が作ってくれたアルバムは、
私たちの、ありのままの姿だったでしょ？
translation:
The album Futaro-kun made of us
was of how we were naturally, right?

japanese: 今回も自然に、普通でいいんだよ。
translation: This time as well, just be normal.

japanese:
そう言われてもなぁ。
撮られるとわかってると難しいだろ。
translation:
Even if you say that.
It's difficult knowing we're going to have our picture taken.

japanese:
とりあえず自然にやってみましょう。
さあ上杉さん、どうぞ！
translation:
Let's just try to be natural, to start with.
Alright, Uesugi-san, you go!

japanese:
お、おう！
そうだな……。
translation:
R-right!
Let's see...

japanese:
あ！　見てみろ、らいは！
とても夏らしい積乱雲があるぞぉー？
translation:
Ah! Look, Raiha!
Those are very summery cumulonimbus clouds, right?

japanese:
あっ、ホントだ！
すっごく大きいねー。
translation:
Oh, for sure!
They're so big!

japanese: な、夏らしい、ね？
translation: S-summery, you say?

japanese: まるで雲のお化けみたいだわー。
translation: They're almost like ghost clouds!

japanese: わーいわーい！
translation: Yay, yay!

japanese: ふ、ふわふわのわたがしみたいですよー。
translation: Th-they look like fluffy cotton candy.

japanese:
あははっ！
みんな余計ぎくしゃくしてるよ？
translation:
Ahaha!
You guys are all so awkward, you know?

japanese:
あんたは仕事でなれてるから、そんなこと言えるのよ。
撮られるとわかってて普通にしてるなんて
無理だから！
translation:
You can say that because you're used to your work.
It's impossible to act normally
because you know you're going to be on camera!

japanese:
アルバム作りって、
意外と難しいのかもしれないねー。
translation: Making an album might be harder that we thought...

japanese:
上杉君が隠し撮りで作ったのは
正解だったのかもしれません。
translation:
Making an album by sneakily taking photos,
like Uesugi-kun, might have been the right move.

japanese:
（くっ、また隠し取りと……。
　根に持ってやがるな？）
translation:
(Urk, she's talking about me sneaking photos again...
 She really holds grudges, huh?)

japanese: 一花のすごさがよくわかった。
translation: I know how amazing you are, Ichika.

japanese:
おっ、嬉しいこと言われちゃった。
ちょっとお姉ちゃんとしての威厳が
アップしたかな？
translation:
Oh, that's really kind of you.
Do you feel like your big sister
is a little more majestic now?

japanese:
どうしましょう？
このままでは、アルバム作りが進みませんね。
translation:
What are we going to do?
At this rate, we won't progress through making an album.

japanese:
カメラを意識させない距離から撮られるなら、
まだなんとかなりそうだが。
translation:
If you can shoot from a distance
we won't be aware of the camera.
If we do that, maybe we can work something out.

japanese:
スマホのカメラじゃ、
遠距離は厳しいんじゃないかしら。
translation:
It's a little tough from afar,
because of the camera on the phone.

japanese:
んー、じゃあいっそ、撮られてるぞーって
感じにしてみる？
translation:
Hm, then, why don't we try making it seem like,
hey, you're on camera!

japanese: どういうことだ？
translation: What do you mean?

japanese:
グラビア撮影だよ。
せっかく水着着てるんだしさ。
translation:
Like a sexy photoshoot.
I mean, we are wearing our swimsuits, aren't we.

japanese:
ええええっ！？
そ、そそ、そんなこと、私にはできません！
translation:
WHAAA?!
I-I-I-I can't do something like that!

japanese: 大丈夫、モデルはフータロー君だから。
translation: It's okay, the model will be Futaro-kun.

japanese: はっ？
translation: WHAAA?!

japanese:
おやぁ？
自分は関係ないと思った？
translation:
Oh?
You thought you wouldn't be involved, would you?

japanese:
グラビアは女の子だけのものじゃないよ。
男女平等に決まってるじゃん。
translation:
Guys can have sexy photos taken of them too,
we should be more inclusive!

japanese:
よーし、では、みんなのお手本に
フータロー君のグラビア撮影をしちゃおう！
translation:
Alright, then, let's take sexy photos
with Futaro-kun being the model!

japanese:
お前が手本を見せるべきだろ。
俺が撮ってやる。
translation:
Show me how it's done, then.
I'll take the pics.

japanese:
却下でーす。
モデルはカメラマンに従ってください。
translation:
I refuse!
The model should listen to the photographer.

japanese:
あのなぁ、冷静に考えろよ。
俺のグラビアになんて需要ないぞ。
translation:
Listen. Think logically here.
There's no demand for my sexy photos.

japanese:
そう？
あるとこには――
translation:
Really?
Depending on who you ask%p-2;――

japanese: ちょっと一花、こっち見ないでくれる？
translation: Hey Ichika, mind not looking over here?

japanese: うん、あるんじゃないかな？
translation: Yep, there just might be some demand.

japanese: （反応に困るわ！！）
translation: (Those reactions sure are troubling!!)

japanese:
とにかく、今は私のターンです。
フータロー君に発言権はありませーん。
translation:
Anyway, it's my turn now.
You have no say in the matter, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
ごめん、今は話を合わせて。
みんなの緊張をほぐすためなんだ。
translation: Now let's talk. It's to relieve everyone's tension.

japanese:
……そういうことか。
なら仕方ない、協力する。
translation:
...So that's how it is.
It can't be helped, then, I'll cooperate.

japanese:
納得できる理由を言え。
どうして他の連中じゃなくて俺なんだ？
translation:
Give me one good reason I should agree to this.
Why do I have to be the model, and no one else?

japanese:
逆に言うと、ちゃんとした理由があれば
協力してくれるんだ？
translation:
So you're saying, if I can give you a good reason,
you'll cooperate?

japanese: それは、まあ、納得できる理由があればな。
translation: Well, that's if there's a reason I can get behind.

japanese:
実はね、これでみんなの緊張を
ほぐせればって思って。
translation:
Actually,
I thought it would ease everyone's tension.

japanese: なるほど、俺はピエロってわけか。
translation: I see, so I'm kind of like a clown.

japanese: 嫌なら無理にとは言わないよ？
translation:
If you don't like it,
I'm not forcing you to do anything?

japanese:
ちゃんとした考えがあるならやるさ。
これもあいつらのためだからな。
translation:
You gave me a good reason, so I'll do it.
This is for them, too.

japanese: よかろう、俺の魅力を引き出せよ？
translation: Fine, you'd better draw out my charm, okay?

japanese:
オッケー、任せといて。
フータロー君の魅力を余すことなく
バッチリ撮ってあげるから。
translation:
Okay, leave it to me.
I won't leave any of your charm on the table, Futaro-kun.
I'll be sure to capture all of it.

japanese:
くっくっく、果たしてお前に
俺の魅力を捉えきれるかな？
translation:
He-he-he, I wonder if you'll be able
to grasp this charm of mine?

japanese:
もちろんだよ。
君のいいところだったらたくさん知ってるもん。
translation:
Of course I will.
I know so many good points about you.

japanese: こういうときに話を合わせてくれるところとか、ね。
translation:
Like, that you're able to go along with me
at a time like this.

japanese: ん？　なんのことだ？
translation: Hm? What do you mean?

japanese:
これでみんなの緊張をほぐせればと思ってさ。
ありがとね、合わせてくれて。
translation:
I'm thinking this will ease everyone's tension.
Thank you for playing along.

japanese:
（俺が先に動いたら、みんなも
　続きやすいだろうと考えたが……
　なるほどな、一花も同じだったか）
translation:
(I thought it would be easier for everyone
 to follow suit if I took action first...
 I see, it was the same with Ichika.)

japanese:
では撮影再開！
フータロー君、よろしくね。
translation:
Alright, we'll start the photoshoot!
Futaro-kun, here we go.

japanese:
グラビアなんて雑誌の表紙くらいしか
知らないんだが、何をすればいいんだ？
translation:
I don't know anything about being sexy
other than magazine covers.
What should I do?

japanese:
上杉さん、自分を解放するんですよ！
自分の中の夏をババーンと！
translation:
Uesugi-san, you have to release yourself!
Express the summer that's inside yourself, just like THAT!

japanese: 自分の中の夏……？
translation: The summer inside myself?

japanese:
（四葉のアドバイスになってないアドバイスは
　おいといて……）
translation:
(Leaving aside Yotsuba's advice,
 which isn't really advice...)

japanese: こ、こんな感じか？
translation: L-like this?

japanese:
おーっ、いいね！
肩からのラインがセクシーだよ～？
translation:
Oh, nice!
The line extending from your shoulders is sexy, you know?

japanese:
じゃあ、ポーズを変えてもらえる？
今度は自分が好きなポーズで！
translation:
Alright, would you change poses?
Next do any pose you'd like!

japanese:
好きなポーズ！？
えー、あー、単語帳を見るポーズ！！
translation:
The pose I like?!
Ehh, ahh, the pose of looking at a vocabulary
flash cards!!

japanese: うんうん、個性が出てていいぞー！
translation: Yeah, yeah, show me that individuality!

japanese: ぷぷっ！　単語帳って。
translation: Ppfftt! Vocabulary flash cards.

japanese: お兄ちゃん……。
translation: Big bro...

japanese:
考える人、のようなものでしょうか？
美術的に考えると。
translation:
How about doing something like 'The Thinker'?
Thinking artistically.

japanese: 一花監督、次は格好いいポーズを。
translation: Director Ichika, please put him in a cool pose next.

japanese: リクエストありなのか！？
translation: You have requests?!

japanese:
それ、いただいちゃいましょう！
さあ格好よく決めちゃって！
translation:
Alright, let's go with that!
Strike a cool pose, now!

japanese:
なっ！？
格好いい、格好いい……これだ！
translation:
Whaaa?!
A cool pose, cool pose...how about this one?!

japanese: エア・メガネ、くいっ！！
translation: AIR GLASSES *nudge* !!

japanese:
いかがでしょう三玖さん。
リクエストにはお応えできましたか？
translation:
Right then, Miku-san.
Was he able to accede to your request?

japanese: もう一声。
translation: I need one more.

japanese: おい三玖！
translation: Hey! Miku!

japanese:
じゃあ次は、流れるようにポーズを変えてみよっか。
もちろんかっこよさを意識して！
translation:
Then why don't you change your pose as if you were
flowing into the next movement?
And of course, be conscious of how cool it is!

japanese: 流れるように！？
translation: Like it's flowing?!

japanese: よっ！　はぁぁっ！　たぁーーーっ！
translation: Yo! Haaaah! Taaaahh!

japanese:
上杉さんが踊ってます！
まさか、これは伝説の上杉流ダンス術では！？
translation:
Uesugi-san is dancing!
Could this be the legendary
Uesugi-Style Dance Technique?!

japanese: ダンス術！？
translation: Dance Technique?!

japanese:
も、もう四葉、変なことを言って
笑わせないでください。
ふふふっ！
translation:
C-come on Yotsuba, don't say anything weird
and make me laugh.
Teeheehee!

japanese:
あれはもう、フー君自身も
何をしているかわかってないわね……。
translation:
Fu-kun really doesn't know what he's doing,
does he...

japanese:
よーし、一通り笑わせてもらったし
次の撮影プランいってみようか。
translation:
Alright, Futaro gave us a brief laugh,
let's talk about the next shoot.

japanese: わ、笑わせって、お前な……。
translation: I-I gave you a laugh, you say...

japanese: それで？　ここで何をするんだ？
translation: And then? What are we gonna do now?

japanese:
では、フータロー君。
二乃に思いっきり水をかけて！
translation:
Alright, Futaro-kun.
Throw some water on Nino, with all your might!

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
いいからいいから！
思いっきりやっちゃって！
translation:
It's fine, it's fine!
Just do it!

japanese: おらぁぁっ！
translation: AYYYYY!

japanese: きゃあ！？
translation: EEEEP?!

japanese: いいよー！　じゃんじゃんかけて！
translation: Good, good! Keep going!

japanese:
もーっ！
いきなりなにするのよ、フー君！
translation:
GRRR!
What did you do that for, Fu-kun?!

japanese: いや、一花の指示で……。
translation: Well, they were Ichika's instructions...

japanese: ええいっ！！
translation: AYYYY!!

japanese:
おわっぷ！？
ごほっ、ごほっ、おい、やめろ！
translation:
WAAA-PPFT?!
*cough* *cough* HEY, stop it!

japanese:
嫌よ！
やられたら倍にして返すのが私流なんだから！
translation:
No way!
If you get me, I get you back twofold, that's MY style!

japanese:
いいね～。
夏の浜辺にふさわしいシチュエーションだよ。
translation:
Nice.
A situation apt for a summer beach.

japanese:
ちょ！？
なんで私まで撮ってるのよ！
translation:
WOAH WOAH?!
What are you taking MY picture for?!

japanese:
フータロー君がお手本見せてくれたでしょ？
ここからは、みんなも一緒に撮っていくからね。
translation:
Futaro-kun showed you how it's done, right?
From now on, I'm going to take all of your pictures.

japanese: だ、だったら先に言いなさい！
translation: Th-then say that first!

japanese:
ほらほら！
止まってないで、もっと水を掛け合って。
translation:
Go on, go on!
Don't stop, keep splashing her with water.

japanese: 了解だ！
translation: You got it!

japanese:
わぷっ！
やったわね、フー君！
translation:
WAAPH!
You've done it now, Fu-kun!

japanese: ははは、さっきのお返しだ！
translation: Hahaha, this is revenge for before!

japanese: じゃあ、お返しのお返しよ！
translation: Then I'll get you back for THAT!

japanese:
よーし、お次は……
さっきとは違って静かな夏をテーマにいこうか。
translation:
Alright, next is...
How about a quiet summer theme, to contrast from before?

japanese:
２人で手をつないで、波打ち際を
微笑ましく歩いている絵なんてよくない？
translation:
Wouldn't a picture of two people holding hands,
smiling along the edge of the waves, be nice?

japanese: ……なんで私に聞くの？
translation: ...Why are you asking me?

japanese:
ここは、フータロー君と三玖の
ツーショットがいいかなって。
translation:
I was thinking a two person shot with you
and Futaro-kun would be nice, Miku.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese: ツーショットはちょっと違うんじゃないか？
translation:
I think a two person shot is supposed to be a little
different from this, right?

japanese: フータロー、カメラマンの指示は絶対。
translation: Futaro, the photographer's orders are final.

japanese:
お、おう。
やる気だな、お前。
translation:
R-right.
You are really getting into it.

japanese: おっ、予想通り絵になるなぁ。
translation: Oh, as expected, it's like a painting.

japanese:
三玖みたいな感じの子が積極的に行くシーンって、
グッと来ちゃう人も多いと思うんだよねー。
translation:
I think that a scene where a girl like Miku
shows how she feels
will make a lot of people emotional.

japanese: ……そう、かな？
translation: ...I wonder?

japanese:
どうですか？
男性代表、フータロー君。
translation:
What do you think?
Male representative, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
いや、まあ……そうだな。
頑張っている姿は、応援したくなるかもな。
translation:
Well, um...let's see.
I guess I'd like to cheer them on,
doing their best and all that.

japanese:
いいねー、この雰囲気！
時間帯が夕方だったら
もっとロマンチックになるのにな～。
translation:
This atmosphere is so nice!
If it were evening,
it would be even more romantic.

japanese:
さて！
フータロー君はそろそろ撮影でお疲れかな？
お疲れだよね？
translation:
Right!
Futaro-kun, are you tired of having your picture taken?
You're tired, right?

japanese:
なんだ？
今度は何を企んでるんだ？
translation:
What?
What are you planning this time?

japanese:
四葉！
今すぐフータロー君を寝かせて、
砂のお布団を掛けてあげて。
translation:
Yotsuba!
Lie Futaro-kun down right now,
and cover him in a blanket of sand.

japanese:
休憩時間だね、オッケー！
上杉さん、どうぞお座りくださーい。
translation:
Time for a break, then! Okay!
Go ahead and have a seat, Uesugi-san!

japanese: おわぁ！？
translation: Woooah?!

japanese: お前ってホントに力強いよな……。
translation: You are really, strong...

japanese: はい、そのまま横になってくださいねー。
translation: Right, then go ahead and lie down just like that.

japanese: へいへい、監督の指示は絶対だもんな。
translation: Alright, because the director's orders are absolute.

japanese: ではベッドメイキングをさせて頂きます！
translation: Then, I'll make your sand-bed!

japanese:
（うおお、みるみる砂が体の上に
　積み上がっていく……）
translation:
(Wow, the sand is piling up so quickly
 on top of me...)

japanese: はいっ！　いっちょ上がりでーす！
translation: Alright! I'm done!

japanese:
さすがの手際だね。
これでフータロー君も、まな板の上の鯉ってわけだ。
translation:
Amazing ability, as usual.
Now Futaro-kun is like a carp on a cutting board.

japanese: なんだよ、その例えは。
translation: What kind of comparison is that?

japanese:
みんなも、フータロー君のお布団を
アレンジしてあげていいよー。
translation:
All of you can arrange Futaro-kun's futon
as you'd like!

japanese:
はーい。
じゃあ、上にお山を作っちゃおうかな？
translation:
Okay.
Alright, then maybe I'll make a mountain on top?

japanese:
手伝いますよー！
どうせなら富士山並みのを作っちゃいましょう。
translation:
I'll help too!
If possible, let's make it as big as Mt. Fuji.

japanese:
や、やめろ！？
重い、これ以上は、砂が重いーー！
translation:
S-stop?!
No more, it's too heavy, the sand is too heavy!

japanese:
はっ！　これは魔王上杉さんが封印されし山脈……。
こんなところにあるとは思いませんでした！
translation:
Hah! This is the mountain range
where the Demon King Uesugi is sealed...
I didn't think it would be in such a place!

japanese:
行きましょう、勇者らいはちゃん！
武闘家四葉がお供します！
translation:
Let's go, Hero Raiha-chan!
Martial Artist Yotsuba will accompany you!

japanese: なんの物語が始まったんだー！？
translation: What kind of story did you just start?!

japanese:
（あー、ひどい目にあった。
　一花のやつめ……）
translation:
(Aah, I'm in quite a pickle.
 That dang Ichika...)

japanese:
（あれ？　チェアで寝ているのは五月か？
　人が大変な目にあってたってのに、
　のんきにお昼寝か）
translation:
(Huh? Is that Itsuki sleeping in a chair?
 She's having a pleasant nap to herself,
 even though there are people in trouble.)

japanese: おい、五月？
translation: Hey, Itsuki?

japanese: すー……。
translation: Zzz...

japanese:
おやおや？
これは、五月ちゃん、溺れちゃったんじゃない？
translation:
Oh, my!
Did Itsuki drown or something?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
大変だぁ！
これは迅速な手当が必要だぁ！
translation:
This is bad!
She needs immediate treatment!

japanese:
フータロー君、今すぐ人工呼吸を！
気道を確保して大量の空気を送り込んで！
translation:
Futaro-kun, she needs CPR!
Secure her airway and give her a lot of air!

japanese: 何を盛り上がってるんだ、寝てるだけだろ。
translation:
What are you getting your panties in a bunch about?
She's just sleeping.

japanese:
ほら、早く早く！
マウス・トゥ・マウス！
translation:
Come on, hurry up!
Give her mouth-to-mouth!

japanese: だからなぁ……。
translation: I said...

japanese:
うーん？
なんですか……騒がしいですね。
translation:
Mmmmm?
What's going on... You guys are loud.

japanese:
五月ちゃん！
あなたは溺れてたところをフータロー君に
助けてもらったの。
translation:
Itsuki-chan!
You were drowning just now but don't worry,
Futaro-kun will save you.

japanese: ……ええっ！？
translation: ...HUUUH?!

japanese: いま人工呼吸するから大人しくしてね。
translation: He's going to perform CPR on you, so relax.

japanese: は、はいっ！
translation: O-okay!

japanese:
って、そんなわけないじゃないですか！
一花！？
translation:
Wait, that can't be true!
Ichika?!

japanese: あはは、バレちゃった。
translation: Ahaha, you caught me.

japanese:
当たり前だ。
こんなザルな嘘が通じるわけないだろ、ったく。
translation:
Obviously.
There's no way such a blatant lie would work,
come on.

japanese:
ありがとね、フータロー君。
結構いい写真がいっぱい撮れたと思うよ。
translation:
Thank you, Futaro-kun.
I think I was able to take a lot of good pictures.

japanese:
なあ一花、そのことなんだが。
お前がずっとカメラマンをしてるだろ？
translation:
Hey, Ichika, about that.
You've been the photographer the entire time, right?

japanese:
そろそろ交代しようぜ。
お前の写真も撮らないと、
想い出のアルバムにならない。
translation:
Let's switch here pretty soon.
If we don't get any pictures of you,
it won't be a good memorial album.

japanese:
ごめんね、わがままなんだけど、
もう少しだけやらせてもらえるかな？
translation:
Sorry, it's selfish,
but would you let me do it a little longer?

japanese:
私って普段は撮られるほうで、
演技に集中してるでしょ？
translation:
I'm usually the one being filmed,
as I'm focused on acting, right?

japanese:
だからこの機会に、
撮るほうの気持ちを勉強しようと思って。
translation:
So, I decided to take this opportunity
to study the nuances of photography and film.

japanese:
ホントごめんね。
でも、あとちょっとだけ私の勉強に付き合ってよ。
translation:
I'm really sorry.
But, please go along with me for
just a little while longer.

japanese:
さあ、そろそろお昼だし、いったん別荘に戻ろ？
五月ちゃんが、お腹空いたって暴れ出しちゃうかも
しれないよ？
translation:
Alright, it's almost noon,
so shall we head back to the villa? Itsuki-chan
might start on a rampage if she gets any hungrier, huh?

japanese: ……ああ、わかった。
translation: ...Yeah, sounds good to me.
